header.title: Welcome to COPENHAGEN FASHION
header.subTitle: FESTIVAL volunteers
header.description: Copenhagen Fashion Week is Scandinaviaâ€™s only fashion week, taking place biannually in January/February and August. Each season, Copenhagen Fashion Week welcomes esteemed press, buyers and influencers to four days of shows, presentations and events as well as the two trade shows CIFF and Revolver.  Sustainability is the core focus area for Copenhagen Fashion Week. Copenhagen Fashion Week strives towards making substantial changes to the way the event is executed, and works to inspire and encourage the industry to take steps towards becoming more sustainable.
